errors.errorTitle: The oauth_version parameter does not correspond to the “1.0” value
errors.errorDescription: The oauth_version parameter does not correspond to the “1.0” value

errors.errorTitle: A required parameter is missing in the request. The name of the missing parameter is specified additionally in the response.
errors.errorDescription: A required parameter is missing in the request. The name of the missing parameter is specified additionally in the response.

errors.errorTitle: The type of the parameter or its value do not meet the protocol requirements (for example, array is passed instead of the string).
errors.errorDescription: The type of the parameter or its value do not meet the protocol requirements (for example, array is passed instead of the string).

errors.errorTitle: The timestamp value in the oauth_timestamp parameter is incorrect.
errors.errorDescription: The timestamp value in the oauth_timestamp parameter is incorrect.

errors.errorTitle: The nonce-timestamp combination has already been used.
errors.errorDescription: The nonce-timestamp combination has already been used.

errors.errorTitle: The signature method is not supported. The following methods are supported: HMAC-SHA1.
errors.errorDescription: The signature method is not supported. The following methods are supported: HMAC-SHA1.

errors.errorTitle: The signature is invalid.
errors.errorDescription: The signature is invalid.

errors.errorTitle: The Consumer Key has incorrect length or does not exist.
errors.errorDescription: The Consumer Key has incorrect length or does not exist.

errors.errorTitle: An attempt of authorization of an already authorized token or an attempt to exchange a not temporary token for a permanent one.
errors.errorDescription: An attempt of authorization of an already authorized token or an attempt to exchange a not temporary token for a permanent one.

errors.errorTitle: The access token has expired.
errors.errorDescription: The access token has expired.

errors.errorTitle: The token is revoked by the user who authorized it.
errors.errorDescription: The token is revoked by the user who authorized it.

errors.errorTitle: The token is not valid, or does not exist, or is not valid for using in the current type of request.
errors.errorDescription: The token is not valid, or does not exist, or is not valid for using in the current type of request.

errors.errorTitle: The confirmation string does not correspond to the token.
errors.errorDescription: The confirmation string does not correspond to the token.

errors.errorTitle: The consumer permission is unknown.
errors.errorDescription: The consumer permission is unknown.

errors.errorTitle: The consumer does not authorized to access the resource.
errors.errorDescription: The consumer does not authorized to access the resource.

errors.errorTitle: The method is not supported or not allowed.
errors.errorDescription: The method is not supported or not allowed.

errors.errorTitle: The Consumer Key is invalid.
errors.errorDescription: The Consumer Key is invalid.

errors.errorTitle: The client ID passed is invalid.
errors.errorDescription: The client ID passed is invalid

errors.errorTitle: The refresh token has expired.
errors.errorDescription: The refresh token has expired.

errors.errorTitle: The password for the username is invalid.
errors.errorDescription: The password for the username is invalid.

errors.errorTitle: Maximum allowed sessions exceeded
errors.errorDescription:
The maximum allowed sessions for the user has been reached, 
Please logout from other devices in order to continue or contact administrator

errors.errorTitle: Device imei not found to be a registered user, please re-authenticate
errors.errorDescription: Device imei not found to be a registered user, please re-authenticate

errors.errorTitle: Device imei sent is not valid
errors.errorDescription: Device imei sent is not valid

errors.errorTitle: Channel is not valid
errors.errorDescription: Channel is not valid, supported channels are WEB and ANDROID

errors.errorTitle: Invalid configuration
errors.errorDescription: Invalid configuration
